response.overview: This video answers the following questions:  Is There Really a God? (Ham) Cain’s Wife—Who Was She? (Ham) Does Distant Starlight Prove the Universe Is Old? (Lisle) Is Natural Selection the Same Thing as Evolution? (Purdom) Doesn’t Carbon-14 Dating Disprove the Bible? (Snelling) Why Shouldn’t Christians Accept Millions of Years? (Mortenson) Did Dinosaurs Turn into Birds? (Menton) Genesis: Today’s Answer to Racism (Kerby) Was There Really a Noah’s Ark & Flood? (Ham) What Really Happened to the Dinosaurs? (Ham) How Did Defense Attack Structures Come About? (Hodge) How to Survive a Secular College (Lisle) Concise and fast-paced, this cutting-edge video is especially great for teens and young adults. (Ten of the answers are based on topics in The New Answers Book 1, and two are totally new.)
response.title: The New Answers DVD Disk 1
